website_summaries.verdict: Although it comes with a few quirks, this model is worth a look for consumers who need a powerful machine with ample space.
pros: Updated model can be expanded to as many as 30 trays, making it ideal for preparing large quantities
cons: A few Gardenmasters quit working after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift for my aunt (9/2) ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my aunt (9/2), she wanted it for drying apples. She got her apples this past weekend (10/7) and prepared the apples for drying loaded the machine with all 4 trays, started it. It ran for 10 minutes and shut off would not start back. She had to wait until Monday to reach out to Nesco customer service. They told her to return it to Amazon, I proceed to do a warranty return and find that the return window was closed on 10/6. I have found no other link for communication with Amazon. Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: lbingham

customer_reviews.title: NESCO Products are GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I bough my first NESCO food dehydrator about 15 years ago. I use it to dry peppers, tomatoes and herbs. Occasionally beef jerky. My original version was a bottom fan version. It is/was terrific! Dried my produce and herbs flawlessly. Alas, recently the fan started to lose speed (velocity?). After 15 years, I could not complain. I just bought this "top down" fan dehydrator. The digital control is great. Much nicer than the previous analog dial. And the size is compatible with my previous dehydrator, so I can still use the 4 trays that I already have. For my money, Nesco makes the best products on the market. High quality at a very reasonable price. Don't hesitate to purchase this!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: Love the dehydrator and super easy to use. I have done apples, cherrys, and bananas. All were great but please be aware that the banana chips I made were NOT like the ones you buy at the store. Those banana chips are crunchy because they have been FRIED not dehydrated-this is not a reflection on this product but I thought I would share this because I thought they were a dehydrated product. The dehydrated bananas are like fruit leather/chewy so are great for oatmeal, muffins or just a snack but they will not be crispy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product two years ago and it broke. I liked it so much that I decided to purchase the product again. When I received the package, the box said, “Made in USA”, but the product itself has the serial number of “Made in China”. That’s probably why my initial purchase broke. I decided to return the item. The labeling is very deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Landingin

customer_reviews.title: New to Dehydrators and Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the timer can run the machine overnight. The trays go in my dishwasher. I have a Bosch dishwasher which doesnt have a heating element and I can put the trays on the top and bottom shelf and run on normal cycle. The machine has a fan and is noisy so you wouldnt want it by a TV or similar as it would be hard to hear. I use mine in another room. Prep the trays in the kitchen and easily carry them to another room where the dehydrator is located.
customer_reviews.author: Endzone

customer_reviews.title: Strongly advise against this product!
customer_reviews.text: I used this once when I bought it. Cleaned it, put it back in the box, and stored it in a clean, dry heated area. Two years later it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product works great to make jerky. It is very efficient and has a better air flow than the other dehydrator I own. I have owned many Nesco dehydrators and have liked them all, but this one is the best I have owned so far for quality, durability and design,
customer_reviews.author: R.S

customer_reviews.title: Not as much space between drying trays as older model!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this item and used it to dry apricots cut into quarters. Apricots were a little larger than golf balls. When stacking the trays some of the apricot quarters touched the tray above it and also the top drying unit. I have an older Nesco model F-75 and the trays have more space between them. The unit worked as described but I was disappointed with the space (clearance) between the drying trays.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked OK for about 9 Months, then quit
customer_reviews.text: It actually worked OK for light to moderate use. Foods took longer to dry than I expected, but I had been used to using my friend's Excalibur. After about 9 months of moderate use it just quit. Wouldn't even power on. I'm disappointed given that I spent close to $100 on this unit. Should have just put that $100 toward buying an excalibur.
customer_reviews.author: NancyRynes

customer_reviews.title: This was my first food dehydrator and maybe it is just the nature of one but I feel like the temperatures and times called out d
customer_reviews.text: Large and works. This was my first food dehydrator and maybe it is just the nature of one but I feel like the temperatures and times called out do not work well. They seem to dry out the outside too fast which you think is done early only to find them come back some. I turn down the temp and cook for the said time or even longer on my peppers to get them perfect. It just took a bit of playing around with time and temp to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Set and forget
customer_reviews.text: This is my first dehydrator so I am by no means an expert. I researched ones in my price range and chose one I can set and forget... this is extremely easy to set and forget, it absolutely dried everything evenly and it's pretty easy to clean. I made fruit roll ups, beef jerky, and trail mix so far, and it did a great job on all.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for a few months and I am thrilled with this dehydrator. Motor on the top, easy to use and very versatile. I have dehydrated so many items since I made this purchase. Saving food and easy to clean and store. I am to nervous to can food so I dehydrate it and store in glass jars with a silica pack and am so very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: when I plug it in, the display lights up correctly. I am able to set the time and the temperature, but when I push the start button, nothing happens. Neither the fan nor the heater start to work. This device was clearly not tested after manufacturing. I AM NOT IMPRESSED! On top of that the "support" person that "tried" to help me knew less about how the machine worked than I did. Again, NOT IMPRESSED!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Schopler

customer_reviews.title: GREAT AMERICAN MADE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because 1. Made in America, 2. Price. This is the third dehydrator I've owned over the years. The first American made dehydrator. The quality of this machine is hands down better than those cheap units I've owned before. This is a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: i2whl4fn

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't get our foods past the point of rubbery.
customer_reviews.text: This unit doesn't get your food past the point of rubbery. We tried bananas, jerky, strawberries. Had a cheap dehydrater as a kid and worked great. Not sure what's going on with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Clozer

customer_reviews.title: Every kitchen should have one of these!
customer_reviews.text: It is everything I hoped for. 10 minutes after it was delivered (I washed it first), I had a batch of beef jerky loaded. 4 hours later I started sampling and the results were fantastic (and much better than my professional smoker). I loved the fact that you can pause the heater/blower, check the trays, put the heater/blower back on top and restart it with the timer/temperature settings intact. I cleaned the trays in the dishwasher (per the instructions) which saved quite a bit of time. I'm already planning on buying one of these with extra trays for my sons next Christmas. All I need now are additional trays.
customer_reviews.author: Terry F.

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I have had many different dehydrators and this one has been my favorite. It has a built in timer and temp control so you no longer have to dehydrate everything at the same temperature and plan your day for when you will start and stop your dehydrator or risk ruining it. The trays clean easily and the fact that you can stack up to 20 trays (I only use 9) makes it worth those big bulk purchases worth while. I have dehydrated fruits, vegies and meat in this sucker and it always does a great job on them all.
customer_reviews.author: Not a Mover or a Shaker

customer_reviews.title: Make own own jerky? Yes please.
customer_reviews.text: I would like to say I bought this just for my wife, but I'm the one making my own jerky. (Feels like being a kid on Christmas morning!) She loves it too of course, she enjoys eating healthy, and has enjoyed the dried fruits. So simple to use and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! Have used it many times already. I did buy additional trays as what comes with it does not seem to be enough. You can get them on Amazon too. Really like the timer setting, as my previous dehydrator did not have that feature. Typically fruit takes 10 hours, sometimes more. I have not made jerky yet, but can't wait to try. My favorite is apples. Bananas were a little chewy and strawberries lost their flavor. Buttons are easy to use and understand. It's not super quiet so we put it in our laundry room off the kitchen then we don't have to hear it. Comes with an instruction book that also has recipes.
customer_reviews.author: martiniblonde

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know who does the quality control over there at NESCO, but when I want a unit to reach the temp it says, I expect it to do so! Ordered THREE of the lesser dial units and they ALL topped out somewhere around 145-150. Only after I returned all 3 and got this one did I get what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Balasa

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I had one for a couple of years, and it worked fine while it worked, but burned out after about 400 hours of running time. I replaced the thermal fuse (possible if you are handy, but not easy) and it ran again for a couple of hours, but the real problem seemed to be that it's running extremely hot, and it burned out the new fuse also. The thermostat or some other aspect of the internal controls has apparently failed. This type of dryer is not the worst junk ever, but it's not designed to last.
customer_reviews.author: sswy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dehydrator. Woud like a fan-only mode (no heat option)
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dehydrator and wanted to give it 5 stars because it works exactly as advertised but there is one thing it does not have - the ability to run the fan without the heat. The lowest temperature is 90 degrees but for my use, I would like the ability to run the dehydrator in a cool-down mode. I certainly encourage those looking for a dehydrator to consider this model but if you need one that can turn the heat off, this will not do it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: much faster than  my old one
customer_reviews.text: The timer is very nice feature, as is the temp control! For jerky, it works soo much better than my last one! No issues with this machine
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Trent

customer_reviews.title: Super Fast
customer_reviews.text: This dehydrator is simple and easy to use. The great thing about it is it is FAST. Some dryers take days to dry items. This one is done in a few hours. You can hear the fan running but it’s not that loud. Best purchase I’ve made in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Icemonkey

customer_reviews.title: New2Dehydrating
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to dehydrating, so I chose this dehydrator for the price and good reviews. I used it to dehydrate celery and was happy with the outcome. It's also light weight, easy to clean, and has a timer that will shut off the dehydrator after specified set time. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: missjm

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a dehydrator that works
customer_reviews.text: Makes jerkey and dried fruit like a champ. I have run it for about 48hrs with no issues, so better than the other two I got.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Great Dehydrator.
customer_reviews.text: This unit works very well. It has digital controls that are easy to figure out. I have used it several times and I noticed it does a very even job of drying whether you have food in all trays or just one. (It recommends to always use the 4 trays regardless of the load.) It is considerably loud but that is expected by any device moving a lot of air. I like the price and would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Netzinger

customer_reviews.title: Great Food dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: I have used this item with no problems. Easy to clean. I have dehydrated many items with great success such as jerky, fruits, and kale chips.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing- stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This dehydrator worked well at first then stopped working just after the return window closed. It blows room temperature air no matter how high I set it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ti

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Makes some good jerky. Could also just be my marinade. But it's easy to use, works drying 8lbs of sliced meat on 12 trays easily and fills the house with the delicious smell of animal flesh. Haven't tried it with fruit yet but don't doubt that it will work fine. Happy I went with a 1000 watt model over lesser power. My wife used to give nutrition classes to schools and lower income families and this is the model she used during some of them.
customer_reviews.author: North to the Future

customer_reviews.title: Usually have no issues with these dehydrators
customer_reviews.text: Dehydrator was doing great, then after about 4 weeks of use the unit sparked and popped one day when I went to turn it on. Unfortunately there is only a 30 day return policy so now im stuck with a very expensive plastic paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: troy

customer_reviews.title: A really good affordable dryer for all sorts of fruit and vegetables and meat
customer_reviews.text: This works great and the feature I like compared to the dryer I had before this is that you can set a timer so that when you're gone or forget to turn it off, it doesn't over dry your product.
customer_reviews.author: David Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Machine works great but trays are cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all with the trays. They are made of very cheap plastic that has warped after first use. Machine works great but trays are junk and thats why i give it a 3 rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fast!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dehydrator a few months ago and have nothing but good to say about it. I loved it so much I have ordered a second one for my parents for Christmas. It is very easy to clean and I love that you can add several more trays. I have tried everything from jerky to fruit and fruit leather, everything turned out wonderful and it’s very quick compared to other dehydrators I have tried in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: This really works well
customer_reviews.text: This works well, but do not let it fall it will brake. The other thing is I wish it was square.
customer_reviews.author: A. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I have used it three times to make jerky. Just set the temp and time and it shuts off,and can pause to check on what ever you are drying. I think it works great.
customer_reviews.author: POPs

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my Momma
customer_reviews.text: She loves this unit! She is excited to add a few more trays. She has done bell peppers, pineapple, apples, strawberries, zucchini. She is having so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amber D. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Works marvelously
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this for our garden veggies. She had no trouble assembling and operating it, and the first attempt was on fresh tomatoes, which ended up outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kronfield

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, has programmable timer
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all. It is pretty easy to use. In addition to a programmable temperature setting, it also has a programmable timer, which is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Right size, job done!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this item for couple of years now and just ordered a second one for my sister. It works great, not as noisy as others. I dehydrate my herbs all the time, really like the thermostat/timer feature. Very convenient, it has the right size and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: AIDA

customer_reviews.title: The best money you will spend!
customer_reviews.text: You will wonder why you never bought one sooner. This is the best dehydrator I have ever owned! It replaced my 20+ year old dehydrator. I am so happy I spent the extra money and got extra trays with it. I think it was an extra 10.00 for 2 trays so I bought 3 extra boxes. The amazing part is you can stack a LOT of trays on this - I think it is up to 20 trays, but you will then have to rotate them.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Perry

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money . I’ve had this a few months and have already made over 100 lbs of jerky .. added 4 more trays can do more then 5 lbs at a time . With 8 trays it still fits under upper cabinets
customer_reviews.author: wayne petro

customer_reviews.title: fast!
customer_reviews.text: bought this mainly for my dog. we make her natural treats and our last machine just was done. this works much quicker but is a bit louder than my last one. the price was great and it is easy to clean after use.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: easy machine! I'm really glad to have gone with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fast, easy machine! I'm really glad to have gone with the one with more watts as it doesn't take as long. It is large enough with 6 trays but also still small enough to store without a problem. Overall this dehydrator looks nice, is easy to clean, quite, and has plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: EMc

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had purchased this sooner.
customer_reviews.text: Love my new dehydrator! I am in the process of trying it out. I have dehydrated several types of vegetables and herbs. Can't hardly wait till Fall when there will be apples to dry. Found a lot of great informative videos on line to help with the how to. I want to become less dependent on my freezer. It is so easy to lose a fortune in food with a power outage. I also purchased a pressure canner to help toward this goal.
customer_reviews.author: Pat W

customer_reviews.title: Great and idiot proof.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. The digital timer really makes cooking easy at night with the food ready to go in the morning.The trays are easy to clean. Its really plug and play for novices like me. I'm glad I got the dehydrator gun too. It helps make great ground beef/turkey jerky
customer_reviews.author: j.gault

customer_reviews.title: Very portable and can be stored easily
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one -the other one lasted over 4 years of almost daily use in my home business so it didn't owe me a dime. Love that you can rack the trays and simply plug it in anywhere convenient & put the dehydrator on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Weber

customer_reviews.title: With regular use the unit should last 6 years
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit as a direct replacement for one that had a heater failure. Company could not help with repair parts so I purchased a new one at a good price. I have 20 trays and it dries all 20 trays. Great unit roe the price.
customer_reviews.author: William V. Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Do not I repeat do not buy this appliance
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several times to use this machine according to instructions and according to feedback from other users to no avail. It takes hours and hours and all you see are fruits going bad not dehydrating got it this is easily the worst purchase of kitchen appliances I have ever made in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ochoa Silva

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.text: I got into making jerky and selling it at work. This dehydrator has increased my production exponentially! The timer and temperature control are awesome. I’ve now expanded to 10 trays and haven’t seen any decline in performance at all. I can dry 10 trays of 1/4 beef in 5.5 to 6.5 hours consistently. Would strongly recommend for anyone looking for a dehydrator!
customer_reviews.author: Jared M.

customer_reviews.title: Really great dehydrator!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is GREAT! I was skeptical about this because it blows/dries from the top rather than the bottom but it works VERY well. Doesn't come with nearly enough trays, so buy more!! It can easily handle 10 even heavily loaded. GREAT buy! We used it for deer jerky and were incredibly satisfied
customer_reviews.author: J. McDole

customer_reviews.title: Very glad to have made this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical about newer designs but love how it works with our existing trays! We also prefer the controls on the lid and the ability to set temperature and time so efficiently. Finally, it is extremely quiet and takes half the time to work than our old dehydrator, even at the lowest temperature setting.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The dehydrator works really well easy to use! The only thing I really didn’t like about it was the one of the trays already broke one of the small slats on it! With hand washing the trays is a little hard to get in between the small slats
customer_reviews.author: Deer hunter

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect a must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband killed two deer this past year and wanted to make jerky so I bought him this and it had been a great investment!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Lopez

customer_reviews.title: If you like dried meat/fruit - then buy this
customer_reviews.text: I've made 4 lbs of beef jerky. 1) 4lbs of beef jerky cost me about $20 in meat, and marginal costs in seasoning 2) I haven't figured out how to make proper dried fruit. 3) Make sure to buy some smoke (also in amazon) to get that little extra flavor. If you like dried meat/fruit - then buy this. It will save you money.
customer_reviews.author: Avi

customer_reviews.title: I use mine EVERY day
customer_reviews.text: I had an old dehydrator and didn't use it much, upgraded to this one and I am a dehydration addict now. I like that it has a timer and will shut off on its own. I've made fruit roll ups, dehydrated veggies, herbs and even tomatoes turned out great. Getting ready to buy more trays since this one will expand to 10 or 12 I believe. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: They turned out great! I will update my review if anything NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly! YAY! I've only dehydrated strawberries. They turned out great! I will update my review if anything NOT amazing happens. But I anticipate awesome ness!
customer_reviews.author: KarlaMarie

customer_reviews.title: ... made a few things so far but I absolutely love it! I'll never have store bought raisins again
customer_reviews.text: I've only made a few things so far but I absolutely love it! I'll never have store bought raisins again! And my family loves my tomatoe 'chips' The last dehydrator I had melted so many trays, I'm loving how sturdy these trays are & how much food I can get on them even with even spacing! So pleased with this purchase :D
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Oye

customer_reviews.title: It's very easy to use and the stacking shelves are awesome compared ...
customer_reviews.text: I dry a lot of fruit! This Nesco is working 16 out of 24 hours for 3-4 days per week. It's very easy to use and the stacking shelves are awesome compared to the trays that are out there! Haven't done any jerky or meat, but I'm sure it'll work great for that as well. Had one that the thermostat got stuck, but I just called it in and they replaced it! Keep the shelves nice and clean for the best possible results.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth O Forgue

customer_reviews.title: The perfect dehydrator setup
customer_reviews.text: This dehydrator is the best. Has time and temp settings and I can set it for whatever I need and check it later. Great feature. I will never own another dehydrator that does not have these features. My BIL liked mine so much he bought one for himself.
customer_reviews.author: WesZ

customer_reviews.title: Best dehydrator short of an excalibur dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: Allows for large 32 tray volume. No need to rotate trays from to bottom. Additional trays are available on Amazon for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Griger

customer_reviews.title: Too loud
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely bigger than I imagined. Pretty loud and the fruits I dried would never really dry completely. They were all chewy like jerky. Maybe that’s just the way their supposed to be after drying. I’m sure the jerky will be better when I get around to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. I have made jerky in this several times. Works great. Easy to use. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scotth

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my husband. We have truly enjoyed using it. Have made several batches of jerky, dried apples, and made fruit leather. Our results were speedy and exceeded our expectations. Since we dry a 5 pound piece of beef at a time we bought extra trays. Plan on drying veggies and herbs his coming summer. If you are reading ratings as you research a dehydrator purchase, please consider this product. It is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Anneree

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice!
customer_reviews.text: I had a food dehydrator years ago, wanted to get back into dehydrating fruits and herbs. This was an excellent choice. Temperature control is great, and its easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes too long to dehydrate
customer_reviews.text: Not pleased with this purchase....if you don't mind the very log dehydration times, it might work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Still working with it. Tried drying herbs using the ...
customer_reviews.text: Still working with it. Tried drying herbs using the instruction book that came with it. It suggested a temp way below the cookbook that I purchased. I followed the manufacturer instructions and found the higher temperature was needed. I need to work with the unit some more to know if I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: tp

customer_reviews.title: Great dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: Works great, dries completely if left in just a little longer than recipe book suggests. Would recommend picking up extra "Nesco MS-2-6 Clean-a-Screen for Dehydrators" from amazon.com as the one it comes with is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Torrey Bee

customer_reviews.title: MAKES GREAT CHICKEN JERKY STRIPS FOR MY DOG :)
customer_reviews.text: GREAT for chicken jerky strips for my dog! I use the clean a screens for my chicken breast strips, cook 4-5 hours depending on the crispness desired. The best method is to purchase boneless chicken breasts, freeze them, then defrost slightly and slice/shave into thin strips- put on clean a screens-dehydrate. ( I purchased extra clean a screens,which makes the trays easier to clean, especially since my chicken strips are very thin.) My Princess LOVES them!
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: We have been pleased thus far
customer_reviews.text: We've been giving this a real workout - lots of apples, carrots, celery, pears, bell peppers, asparagus, green beans, and more I plan to try drying. We have been pleased thus far. It isn't quiet but it isn't that noisy either - you do know it is running. The controls are super easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to understand the directions, huge capacity in small footprint, quiet, easy to add extra "risers" to dry even more. I love, love, love this and am 100% satisfied with my purchase. Great value for the price, too. FYI - dried bananas taste like banana bread. :)
customer_reviews.author: MDeran

customer_reviews.title: I have only used it for jerky.
customer_reviews.text: Used this unit several times now for beef jerky. Cooks five pounds in about 5 hours at 160 degrees. Jerky comes out perfect, no need to rotate trays. Fill it up and take the jerky out 5 hours later and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: mary j.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly great dehydrator. Expands up to 20 racks what that's so much jerky or in my case apple chips
customer_reviews.author: christinajoy

customer_reviews.title: Great 2nd dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: Hi have had the Snackmaster for years and decided to step up to a new and larger model. Love the fact that this one has a built in timer and temperature gauge. So far I have dehydrated apricots, nectarines, peaches, pineapple, bananas, grapes and tomatoes. Also have made beef jerky from flank steak. All turn out great and family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: egaildee

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, working as expected for months now. I'm dehydration everything in the house, lol. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: oke10710

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We use this to dry fruits. After ten years we wore out our first dehydrator and needed a replacement. Since we were happy with our original dehydrator we wanted to replace it with the same model.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Been using this regularly since I purchased it and I'm very pleased. Even with six very full trays (only comes with four, I suggest buying a couple more) it seems to dry all trays evenly. Simple to use. It is a bit noisy, but I would expect that with any dehydrator.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: All buttons are working fine. So far we have made 5 batches (Apple
customer_reviews.text: First time buyer/dehydrator. This product is a bit louder, so we only use in the night and in a secluded area. I never used, saw another type, so I can't tell how louse/silent this unit compares with others. The dryness is uniform in all trays, all direction as many others pointed out. All buttons are working fine. So far we have made 5 batches (Apple, strawberry, banana, pear, pineaple) all came out perfectly. If you are looking to buy a dehydrator, i would highly recommend this unit to give it a try ***Made is USA***
customer_reviews.author: Otzi

customer_reviews.title: has been the best. I had in mind to buy the other ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used it 4 times already and this G.F.D. has been the best. I had in mind to buy the other brand,which looks like a big black box and more expensive. But I decided to gibe this brand a try, and less expensive. Other users review really helped me make my final decision. The timer is great. I run the gadget in the kitchen before going to bed, close the door and by morning, it is a bingo!!!my dried fruit is ready and packed and put in the freezer for all time use. All the trays get equal temperature and I've been very happy.
customer_reviews.author: SARA M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Just love the job this thing does. So glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Dehydrater is large but love it
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this dehydrator. It works great but is rather larger than expected BUT that's okay as big as it is...I was able to do quite a bit of dehydrating this summer. Now I cannot wait till next season as plan to plant a large amount of herbs to dehydrate! Happy that I got a large one!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M. Paulsen

customer_reviews.title: Nesco FD 1040 - 1000 watt food dehydrator-  good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this dehydrator. It's great that it has a timer. I had an older model without a timer and blew air from the bottom. This one blows air from the top. Even though the one that blows from the bottom seemed more efficient because you could turn it on and load bottom tray first and put lid on while you prepare for next tray, it didn't have a timer- so you might have to get up in middle of the night to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Jujube

customer_reviews.title: Nesco FD-1040 100 watt Food Dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: The Nesco FD-1040 100 watt dehydrator works great on fruit and veggies. It is very quiet--can watch TV in the same room with it nearby. Easy to store in the box in my closet when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce D. Pruhs

customer_reviews.title: Great dehydration
customer_reviews.text: Has worked great so far for dehydrating fruit and vegetables. My grandson loves apple leather made from canned applesauce.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Collins

customer_reviews.title: This is a great dehydrator that delivers even drying to up to 20 ...
customer_reviews.text: Remove moisture and greatly extend shelf life of your food. This is a great dehydrator that delivers even drying to up to 20 trays. If you have a busy family this is a great way to provide proper nutrition when you are not at home. Dehydrate the foods you want and put them in a zip lock baggie and go. Great for a purse, briefcase, or back pack. Love the timer that shuts off the unit to prevent over drying. You will not regret buying this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: A great little dehydrator for the money
customer_reviews.text: A great little dehydrator for the money. Fairly quiet, works quickly. dries things evenly so you don't have to move pieces around to get them evenly dry. Extra trays are available to make many square feet of dehydrating space.
customer_reviews.author: L. T. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for 7 months now and use it often. It seems to be still working properly with no issues. I would recommend this for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nor Cal Girl

customer_reviews.title: The 10 hour batch came out perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it 3 times to make some beef jerky. First batch I cooked for 14 hours, came out overcooked, next was 12 urs, then 10 hours. The 10 hour batch came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Nesco FD-1040 because it's digital and I don't need to worry about forgetting to turn it off. The dehydrator meet my expectations and it's really easy to use and clean, and the time to dehydrate is according to it's manual. I'm planning to buy more trays to expand it (4 trays aren't enough). The best part of it is that FD-1040 can be expanded to 20 trays! The worst problem is the price to buy more 16 trays...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: First time I've dehydrated anything, and this Nesco dehydrator makes it easy to do. I need to add more trays since they fill up fast with sliced fruits or vegetables. This is a must-have for food storage.
customer_reviews.author: kn

customer_reviews.title: Looking for HELP
customer_reviews.text: Hi I am from Puerto Rico, (North American territory), I bought the Nesco FD-1040 by Amazon. Excellent product, it has been a week since I bought it, I have no complaints about the product, I am very happy with it, the only problem I have is that Amazon does not allow me to buy the trays and other accessories. I can not understand why Amazon tells me, They can not send ((Add-A-Tray [FD-1000, 1010, 1020, 1040-Set of 2] White, 15-1/2'')) or ((Lg. Clean-A-Screen ® [FD-1000, 1010, 1020, 1040 Set of 2 15-1/2'')). If anyone knows how I can get the accessories please let me know. thanks drwilsontorres@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Wilson T.

customer_reviews.title: Defective nesco
customer_reviews.text: Just at one year and approx ten times of use the fan blade came off motor and the unit is worthless
customer_reviews.author: mokie

customer_reviews.title: ... been using it for dehydrating tomatoes and it works nicely! Even if it's plastic it's well made and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for dehydrating tomatoes and it works nicely! Even if it's plastic it's well made and I love the timer option! ...recommended!
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Love the timer- you can set it and it will ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the timer- you can set it and it will turn off on its own. The only problem is that small items all fall to the bottom, but they can easily be retrieved there. Be sure to get the extra set of two trays, you'll want to do as many trays as you have each time!
customer_reviews.author: ladynettie

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, easy to use and clean. Makes great jerky!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Electical issues?
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for dehydrating hot peppers twice. There was a clicking sound on the third use and the heater went out. Luckily it was within 30 days and Amazon refunded. Replaced it with a Nesco FD75 and so far so good after 2 uses. Read that there have been occasional electrical issues in the past with some models.
customer_reviews.author: RLingo

customer_reviews.title: Makes great jerky!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and clean. Ive only used it to make jerky and it has been great every time.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the Nesco FD-1040 1000-watt Gardenmaster Food Dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: I had the previous version without a timer that had a bottom heater which I liked quite a lot. This one is 100 times better! I love the times so I do not forget to shut it off saving on electricity. It also is much more powerful and does a much better job more quickly.
customer_reviews.author: di Koehler

customer_reviews.title: New dehydrator an improvement over old versions
customer_reviews.text: I have a very old version of this dehydrator-- a couple of company name changes ago-- that gave up the ghost. This model appears to be far superior in air circulation, and includes features the old one did not have such as timed settings and temperature recommendations-- the old one simply allowed me to set a temperature and fan speed. The old one seemed to over-dry things and this new one seems much more gentle, if that makes sense. The dehydrator seems to be well made and I expect many years of service. One of the best things-- my old racks fit this unit, allowing me to expand it!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: but easy enough for me to tune out while I sleep
customer_reviews.text: It works as described. It's not quite, but easy enough for me to tune out while I sleep. Love the time settings. Wished they made an affordable square one without a hole in the middle so I could make raw vegan bread or pizza crust
customer_reviews.author: Lola Jones

product_meta.title: Nesco Gardenmaster Food dehydrator, White
product_meta.description: Dry fruit and vegetables, herbs and flowers, granola or strips of jerky in hours instead of days with this 1000-watt food dehydrator. Top mounted fan eliminates liquids dripping into the heater chamber. New Digital Time is programmable for up to 48 hours. Expands up to 20 trays allowing you to dry large quantities all at once. Drying pressure adjusts automatically to the number of trays. Patented Converge-Flow forces heated air down the exterior pressurized chamber, then horizontally across each individual tray, converging in the center, for fast, even and nutritious drying. Flavors don't mix, and there's no need to rotate the trays. 2,400 RPM fan motor is four times faster than dryers with no fan or motors. The unit's adjustable thermostat ranges from 90 degrees to 160 degrees F, providing the flexibility needed to ensure excellent results. Vita-Save Exterior features an opaque exterior which blocks light to retain more of the foods nutrients and vitamins during the drying process. Includes: 4 trays, Fruit Roll Sheet and a Clean-A-Screen. Additional trays sold separately.
feature_bullets: 1000 watts of drying power provides even heat distribution
(4) BPA Free trays with 1 sq. ft. of drying area per tray - Expandable to 20 trays
Proudly made in the USA of global and domestic components
Includes (1) Fruit Roll Sheet, (1) Clean-A-Screen, a sample of Jerky Seasoning & Cure, and a 52-page recipe & instruction book

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
